verses.text: Hear this, O household of Jacob, called by the name of Israel, and sprung from the loins of Judah, who swear by the name of the Lord, and celebrate Israel’s God – but neither with justice or truth;
for they call themselves after the holy city, and lean on the God of Israel, whose name is the Lord of Hosts.
Of old I announced predictions, and uttered them forth from my lips: of a sudden I wrought, and they came.
But I knew that you were stubborn, with a neck like an iron band, and a forehead all of brass;
so I told it you long ago: ere it came to pass, I informed you: in case you should claim that your idol had wrought it, your images – molten or graven – appointed it.
You have heard it, now see it fulfilled; wilt you not bear witness to it? The Restoration of Israel and the Future Glory of Zion
